description:

title: nova/auth/fakeldap.py is missing a few unit tests

comments.content:
nova/auth/fakeldap.py is reasonably well covered by the test suite, but there are a few gaps:

    https://jenkins.openstack.org/job/nova-coverage/1080/cobertura/nova_auth/fakeldap_py/

comments.content:
This module was moved to nova/tests/fake_ldap.py in this commit:

commit 821271113df9cfc2be6b24cd5574fbe08b4cd815
Author: Yaguang Tang <email address hidden>
